dao.name: QRY_ROOM_DATA_LIST
dao.statement: SELECT ROOM_NOS, ROOM_COD, ROOM_STA, CLEAN_STA, OOS_STA, ASSIGN_STA, ALT_NAM, CI_DAT, CO_DAT, ROOM_RMK, VIEW_BGCOLOR FROM TMP_PMS0210030_ROOM_LIST WHERE ATHENA_ID = :athena_id AND HOTEL_COD = :hotel_cod AND USR_ID = :usr_id AND SOCKET_ID = :socket_id ORDER BY VIEW_SEQ
